fulltext:
Duc TRAN 
Q. Đống Đa, Hà Nội 
SUMMARY 
Fullstack .NET  developer with strong passion in Cloud Technology. I have worked in many different projects and 
in various technology. I'm also known as a good problem solver and not only as a simple coder. Currently, I have 
stronger skill in backend than frontend. In long term, I want to improve myself in frontend technology with 
JavaScript framework such like Angular JS, React, Vue.js... 
Developer 
EDUCATION 
2011 – 2015 : 
ESIEE Paris, Marne-la-Vallée 
Major Embedded Systems 
2009 – 2011 : 
« Classes préparatoires » at Chaptal High School, Paris 
Speciality mathematics – physic 
WORK EXPERIENCES 
09/2018 –  Curent : 
Fullstack .NET developer/Machine Learning engineer – Mesoco, Hanoi, Vietnam 
Fulltime job 
Participated in design software architecture and development of a picture archiving  
and communication system in medical imaging domain using .NET framework. 
With startup spirit, all members take responsibility in all technology aspect of the project  
such like write and deploy windows service, deploy the project in server with IIS,... 
Researched AI and machine learning to help radiologist in the diagnosis using NLP (for  
labelization) and Fully Convolutional Network, Unet. 
01/2018 – Current : 
Unity developer/Project Manager – Hanoi, Vietnam 
Personal project 
Developed a 3D game, a programming puzzle game with a landing page 
Connected the game's frontend with the backend 
Managed a team of 4 members (artist/designer, web developer, Unity developer) 
10/2016 – 08/2018: 
Senior Mobile Android developer, Gameloft – Hanoi, Vietnam 
Fulltime job 
Learned computer graphics by developing a 3D engine with C++ and OpenGL. 
Ported a game written in C++ to Android platform. 
Implemented new game feature with C++/Java/Flash (Action Script). 
01/2016 – 08/2016: 
Android developer , Dotscreen – Paris, France 
Fulltime job 
Development for Android platform 
Video-On-Demand applications (OCS, FilmoTV, Beinsport, Natgeo, ...) 
Optical Character Recognition application using Tesseract bibrary 
01/2015 – 06/2015 : 
Embedded Linux developer, Parrot – Paris, France 
Internship 
Participated in design software architecture and development of a drone simulator. 
Studied about many sensors's functions: GPS, Ultrasound. 
Used Gazebo simulator to simulate environment's physics. 
04/2013 – 07/2013 : 
Frontend .NET developer – The Kite, Prague, Czech Republic 
Internship 
Developed the TKHS (The Kite Homeport Sytem) – bikesharing sytème 
Writed an algorithm for interchange between two field 
Added intellisense function in HMI 
SKILLS 
Fullstack .NET  
Engineering : 
Languages : Java/JEE, C/C++, C#, SQL, HTML, VBA, UNIX Shell, Batch, Action Script 
Environment : Windows, Linux, Android, Visual Studio, .NET, Eclipse, Microsoft Access, 
SVN, Git, Matlab 
Project Management : Scrum/Agile methodology 
Languages : 
French : Fluent  
English : Professional 
Vietnamese : Mother-tongue 
ACTIVITES/INTERESTS 
Interests : 
Running, Unity 3D, scientific blog, Go chess 
Travel :  
European countries, Thailand, USA
